source.292a4861:
india_cases = omicron_cases_all[omicron_cases_all['location']=='India'].head()
india_cases = india_cases.sort_values(by='total',ascending=False).head()

variants = ['Alpha','B.1.1.277','B.1.1.302','B.1.1.519','B.1.160','B.1.177','B.1.221','B.1.258','B.1.367','B.1.620','Beta','Delta','Epsilon','Eta','Gamma','Iota','Kappa','Lambda','Mu','Omicron','S:677H.Robin1','S:677P.Pelican','others','non_who']
for i in variants:
    var = i
    india_cases_var = covid_Variants_cases[covid_Variants_cases['variants']==var].head()
    india_cases_var = india_cases_var.sort_values(by='total',ascending=False).head()
